!Hierarch Kekropus: Are you an Inspector? Ah! I don't know how long it has been since I saw one who has mastered all the Kamael battle skills and reached the summit of our natural abilities. Since you've opted to become an Inspector, I suspect you have a healthy curiosity. Good! It will serve you well as you discover more about your new abilities...
